sudo apt install libicu-dev
sudo pip3 install pyicu

sudo apt install python3-pip
sudo pip3 install pip --upgrade

sudo apt install git 

# gramps
cd
git clone https://github.com/gramps-project/gramps
cd gramps
python3 setup.py build
./Gramps.py --config=database.backend:dbapi -C "data.gramps" -i example/gramps/data.gramps 

# gprime
sudo pip3 install simplejson tornado -U
cd
git clone https://github.com/gramps-project/gramps-connect
cd gramps_connect/
PYTHONPATH=. python3 -m gprime.app --database=data.gramps --username=demo
